Articles.Content:
Is there thread for small craft that can carry one kerbal to mun and back?

Under say 1.5t when in flight.....like this one.

![screenshot96.png](https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BVm5RQAzIcw/VUBJZk0-N_I/AAAAAAAABLk/AVliUG31Dq4/s1600/screenshot96.png)

The Farscrape project , lands on Plock. A go any where smigs three stages and lander, two too get you there, one to help you return.

![screenshot306.png](https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9iPhfrr5Xic/VUfjQAkkK3I/AAAAAAAABN8/-FfVjkfqSEY/s320/screenshot306.png)![screenshot284.png](https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ax8OwxQZ2XM/VUfi8p2VIlI/AAAAAAAABNs/z3j30Bkpz_I/s320/screenshot284.png)
